Package src.main.domain.controllers

Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.main.domain.controllers.SearchController
  • public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    The SearchController class allows searching for documents in the system by different criteria such as author, relevance, similitude, boolean expression, or title. It also allows creating, modifying, and deleting queries.

        query - the new query string
        Throws:

        notFoundQuery - if a query with the given name does not exist

      • getDocumentsByAuthor

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getDocumentsByAuthor​(java.lang.String author)
                                                                                throws emptyAuthor,
                                                                                       authorWithoutDocs,
                                                                                       notFoundAuthor
        Returns a list of all documents written by the given author. Format: [[Title1, Author1], [Title2, Author2], ...]
        Parameters:
        author - the author of the documents to be returned
        Returns:
        a list of all documents written by the given author
        Throws:
        emptyAuthor - if the author is an empty string
        authorWithoutDocs - if the author has not written any documents
        notFoundAuthor - if the author does not exist in the system

      • getDocumentByRelevance

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getDocumentByRelevance​(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                         int k)
                                                                                  throws notEnoughDocuments
        Returns a list of the k documents most similar to the document with the given query. Format: [[Title1, Author1], [Title2, Author2], ...]
        Parameters:
        query - the string to compare to
        k - the number of similar documents to return
        Returns:
        a list of the k documents most relevant to the given query
        Throws:
        notEnoughDocuments - if there are not enough documents in the system to return k relevant documents

      • getDocumentBySimilitude

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getDocumentBySimilitude​(java.lang.String title,
                                                                                          java.lang.String author,
                                                                                          int k)
                                                                                   throws notFoundDocument,
                                                                                          notFoundAuthor,
                                                                                          notEnoughDocuments,
                                                                                          emptyTitle,
                                                                                          emptyAuthor
        Returns a list of the k documents most similar to the document with the given title and author. Format: [[Title1, Author1], [Title2, Author2], ...]
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the document to compare to
        author - the author of the document to compare to
        k - the number of similar documents to return
        Returns:
        a list of the k documents most similar to the document with the given title and author
        Throws:
        notFoundDocument - if the document with the given title and author does not exist
        notFoundAuthor - if the author does not exist in the system
        notEnoughDocuments - if there are not enough documents in the system to return k similar documents
        emptyTitle - if the title is an empty string
        emptyAuthor - if the author is an empty string

      • getDocumentsByBooleanExpression

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getDocumentsByBooleanExpression​(java.lang.String query)
                                                                                           throws queryNotCorrect
        Returns a list of documents that match the given boolean expression query. Format: [[Title1, Author1], [Title2, Author2], ...]
        Parameters:
        query - the boolean expression query to match documents to
        Returns:
        a list of documents that match the given boolean expression query
        Throws:
        queryNotCorrect - if the query is not a valid boolean expression query

                                                                                      boolean asc)
        Sets the ordering criteria for search results.
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode for ordering the results (by title, author, acces date...)
        asc - whether the results should be ordered in ascending or descending order
        Returns:
        the search results with the new ordering criteria applied
